subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: As Carli Lloyd showed against China, she can be the engine that makes the U.S. team run at full speed and the leader who may decide how far it will go.
snippet: As Carli Lloyd showed against China, she can be the engine that makes the U.S. team run at full speed and the leader who may decide how far it will go.
